ojc.ahni.event

Interface AHNIEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ESHyperNEATTranscriberBain, HyperNEATTargetFitnessFunction, RetinaProblemFitnessFunction, TargetFitnessFunctionMT, TestTargetFitnessFunction, TestTargetFitnessFunctionNEAT

    public interface AHNIEventListener
    An interface for objects that listen to events that occur during an evolutionary run in AHNI. An object will typically register as a listener via the AHNIRunProperties object passed to the Configurable.init(com.anji.util.Properties) method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
